heading: HB02046
0: AN ACT MANDATING DANGEROUS DRUGS COURTS TO STRICTLY ENFORCE THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 9165 OR THE COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002 AND TO EFFECT A REDUCTION OF DRUG-RELATED CASES, DECLOGGING OF THE SAME COURTꞌS DOCKETS, AND STREAMLINING THE FIVE PILLARS OF THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM
status: Pending with the Committee on DANGEROUS DRUGS since 2019-07-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB02046
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING DANGEROUS DRUGS COURTS TO STRICTLY ENFORCE THE PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 9165 OR THE COMPREHENSIVE DANGEROUS DRUGS ACT OF 2002 AND TO EFFECT A REDUCTION OF DRUG-RELATED CASES, DECLOGGING OF THE SAME COURTꞌS DOCKETS, AND STREAMLINING THE FIVE PILLARS OF THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM
